CustomField.description: Shows values from fields Phone, Address or email based on the picklist value in field Type__c.
CustomField.formula: IF ( ( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '3') || ISPICKVAL(Type__c,'2') ), FullAddress__c , IF ( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '0')), PhoneNumber__c , IF ( (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, '1')), Email__c , 'neuvedeno')))
CustomField.label: Value
